content: Taking all this into account, we are establishing guidance for the fourth quarter fiscal 2022 ending March 31, 2022, as follows: we anticipate service revenue to be in the range of $173.5 million to $175.5 million, representing approximately 30% to 31% year-over-year growth; we expect that Fuze's revenue contribution will be about $20 million for the rough 10 weeks to period; we anticipate total revenue to be in a range of $180 million to $182 million representing approximately 24% to 26% year-over-year growth. Combining our outperformance for the third quarter with the outlook above, we are raising revenue guidance for full year fiscal 2022 ending March 31, 2022, as follows: we are raising total revenue outlook to a range of $636 million to $639 million, approximately 20% year-over-year growth.
